div.a: Freedom Elementary School Recognized as a Model Professional Learning Community at Work

span.p: Freedom Elementary School has been recognized by Solution Tree for its sustained success in raising student achievement.

div.a: Erin McGohon to Serve on Kentucky Association for School Social Workers (KASSW) Board

span.p: District Supervisor of Social Services Erin McGohon has been selected to serve on the Kentucky Association of School Social Workers (KASSW) board.

div.a: Educators Earn Google Level 1 and 2 Certification

span.p: The number of educators earning Google Level 1 and 2 Certification has increased.

div.a: Livox AAC Communication Devices Enhancing Education for Speech/Language Pathology Students

span.p: Speech/Language Pathology students and teachers have been gifted with 25 Livox AAC communication devices.

div.a: Students Earn Honors at Senior Beta Club Convention

span.p: The 2020 Senior Beta Club Convention featured honors galore for Bullitt County Public School high school students.

div.a: Discovery School Alters Student Application Process

span.p: Parents of Bullitt County fifth grade students interested in attending The Discovery School will find a new application process.
